page.title: 06UNITED REFORMED CHURCH
page.content: THE CHURCH WAS BUILT IN I896 WHEN IT WAS CALLED THE HINDHEAD FREE CHURCH. IN I972 SEVERAL CHURCH GROUPS CAME TOGETHER AND IT WAS THEN CALLED THE UNITED REFORMED CHURCH. THE CHURCH IS PART OF THE HASLEMERE COUNCIL OF CHURCHES OF WHICH THE REVEREND COX IS THE CHAIRMAN. THE CONGREGATION COMES MAINLY FROM HINDHEAD, BEACON HILL AND GRAYSHOTT. THE CHURCH IS ALWAYS KEPT OPEN FOR PEOPLE TO PRAY AND TO LOOK AROUND. ABOUT 3O-4O PEOPLE COME TO A SERVICE, MOST OF WHOM ARE ELDERLY OR RETIRED.A COLLECTION IS TAKEN AT EVERY SERVICE. THE NON-CONFORMIST RELIGION PRACTISED HERE MEANS THAT THE SERVICE IS NOT TIED TO A SERVICE BOOK. THE CONGREGATION JOIN IN THE SERVICE BUT THERE IS NO CHOIR.THE CONGREGATION ARE VERY ACTIVE IN RAISING FUNDS FOR LOCAL AND NATIONAL CHARITIES.
